title: Store sells haram clothes with pictures, Halal to work there? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Ayman from the U.S. Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Wa Alaikumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh So, there is this store near me that sells shoes and clothes and I would like to apply to that job but some of the clothes that they sell has pictures on them so I was wondering if it's permissible for me to work there Jazak Allah Khair Wa Jazakum Basically, it is not permissible for you to sell something that is haram and unfortunately, living in a kafir country like the U.S. or Europe and being the breadwinner would be next to impossible if we were to say that you have to work in a 100% halal job because usually, people in such lands don't pay attention to what is halal or haram and they would consider what you're asking them not to do as ridiculous if not insane and extreme So, it seems to me that if the majority of the clothes that you're selling is halal and there is this one or two or few items that may contain a picture on them and you don't have any other choice or alternative but to sell them I pray to Allah Azza wa Jal that this is permissible for you and if you give some money in charity as a compensation for any haram income that may have occurred on your paycheck due to selling such haram clothes that would be a positive thing to do and Allah knows best
